name: The Ground Under
description:
The Ground Under is an open world winter survival game made by Snowbox Games (Two man team at the moment)! The objective is to survive and thrive in the barren and frozen wasteland. Waking up in an abandoned missile facility you the player has to discover what has happened and where the other members of your team are. Discover forgotten bunkers, mine, refine and create resources to forge your own custom bunker!

THIS GAME IS VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT

THERE WILL BE BUGS AND GLITCHES!

If you have time please fill in the google form below to submit any feedback or problems you find while playing our game!

Click Here To Fill In The Feedback Form

CURRENT GAME VERSION: 0.0.1 Prototype Test

With more features constantly being made to the game follow our itch.io page and twitter to keep up to date!
